articles.title: Amplats has agreed to new five-year wage deal, says union - News24
articles.description: Anglo American Platinum, the world’s biggest platinum miner by market value, has agreed to a new five-year wage deal, according to the Association of Mineworkers and Construction Union.

articles.title: Biden angers China with vow to defend Taiwan - News24

articles.content:
